name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: Mixed greens topped with grilled chicken, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and balsamic vinaigrette.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Pasta tossed in a creamy sauce with pancetta, egg, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Plant-based patty with lettuce, tomato, pickles, and house sauce on a toasted bun.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.
